name: Mocean Energy
description:
Mocean Energy designs and delivers ocean energy technology to provide clean, carbon-free, renewable power. 

Established in Scotland during 2015, Mocean Energy’s successful hybridisation of wave energy with solar power, supplemented by energy storage, have been a key part of its efforts to provide a more capable ocean energy platform for continuous power delivery.  

With main offices in Edinburgh and Aberdeen, with additional satellite offices throughout the UK, Mocean Energy is developing scalable core wave energy technology which will feed additional markets, from islands to national energy grids.
slogan: Green energy out of the blue.
